text:
e="preserve">"Heal the Living" is a 2016 French and Belgian drama movie. It was presented in the Horizons section at the 73rd Venice International Film Festival
"Heal the Living" was released in the United States. It was rated R by Motion Picture Association of America.
Cast.
The movie was rated near 91% by Rotten Tomatoes based on 54 reviews. On the Metacritic, it has an 82/100 rating based on 12 critics, meaning "universal acclaim".
"Variety" said the movie was "heart crushing".
